cu.explanation_en: Setting the local SCTP data port to 99999 exceeds the valid port range, causing SCTP binding failure.

du.explanation_en: Setting preamble received target power to 100 dBm exceeds the valid power range, causing RACH failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將前導接收目標功率設定為 100 dBm 超過有效功率範圍，會導致 RACH 失敗。
